parameters.name: zendesk_subdomain
parameters.label: Auth Redirection Base URL
parameters.helpText: The base of the redirect URI path for redirecting authentication. Found in url: https://{subdomain}.zendesk.com

parameters.name: azure_client_id
parameters.helpText: This is the Client ID Generated by Azure App Registration.
parameters.label: Azure Client ID

parameters.name: azure_tenant_id
parameters.helpText: This is the Tenant ID Generated by Azure App Registration.
parameters.label: Azure Tenant ID
